English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / Voyager World Elite Credit Card Voyager World Elite Credit Card Follow the thrill, leave the rest to us The credit card that turns every moment of your travel journey into a seamless, rewarding experience from the first dream to the final memory. Welcome offer 150,000 Voyager Miles Travel Perks Unparalleled travel benefits throughout your journey Voyager Miles Earn 12 Voyager Miles with every AED 1 travel spends Apply & Travel More Voyager World Elite Credit Card Benefits Welcome offer Earn and Redeem Activate your Card Get your card Start your journey with Voyager World Elite Credit Card Welcome Offer Earn up to 150,000 Voyager Miles when you spend AED 70,000 within first 3 billing statements Joining fees NIL Annual fees: First Year Free AED 1,500 (Second Year Onwards) Salary Requirement Minimum Salary AED 25,000 Earn up to 12 Voyager Miles on your spends Turn your everyday purchases into rewarding experiences with Voyager Miles on every spend. Earn 12 Voyager Miles for every AED 1 spent on Voyager Travel Portal Earn 6 Voyager Miles for every AED 1 spent on all other travel bookings Earn 1 Voyager Mile for every AED 1 spent on all retail transactions Know more Use your Voyager Miles to Purchase flight tickets Book your hotel stay Transfer Your Miles Partner Airlines and Hotels Voyager Travel Portal Access your one stop destination seamlessly through ENBD X Log in to ENBD X Select your Emirates NBD Voyager Mastercard Credit Card Click on your Voyager Miles Balance and you will be redirected to the Voyager Travel Portal One Portal. Infinite travel rewards. From  dream destinations to luxury stays, the Voyager Travel Portal lets you earn redeem, and transfer miles seamlessly. Complimentary Visa Appointment and Processing Enjoy end to end hassle free travel visa services from OneVasco Know more Complimentary Visa Appointment and Processing Enjoy end to end hassle free travel visa services from OneVasco Enjoy a seamless visa experience with our complimentary Travel Visa Concierge service, powered by OneVasco. From documentation to approvals, every step is handled for you – so you can focus on planning your journey. Learn more Domestic & International Airport Transfers Experience seamless comfortable rides from your home to the airport, or to your hotel and back making every journey effortless from the very start. Know more Domestic & International Airport Transfers Experience seamless comfortable rides from your home to the airport, or to your hotel and back making every journey effortless from the very start. Enjoy the comfort of complimentary airport transfers within Dubai & Abu Dhabi City limits, whether you are heading out or returning home. For International Travel, arrive in style with our complimentary airport Transfers available in select global destinations. Learn more International Meet & Greet Receive check-in assistance, escort through immigration, baggage claim, and customs at select airports Know more International Meet & Greet Receive check-in assistance, escort through immigration, baggage claim, and customs at select airports Travel in comfort from the moment you land  with our complimentary International Meet & Greet service. Enjoy priority assistance through arrivals, immigration and baggage claim – ensuring a smooth stress-free airport experience every time you travel. If you are traveling to Europe, Asia, and the Middle East through one of their 90 busiest airports, make sure to skip the waiting queues with the international meet and assist services by Diamond Air for a smooth and seamless journey, anytime, anywhere. Learn more Immigration Fast Track Services Unlock 3 complimentary fast track services per year Know more Immigration Fast Track Services Unlock 3 complimentary fast track services per year Skip the queues with our complimentary Immigration Fast Track services. Enjoy priority access at immigration counters and expedited clearance, so you can breeze through the airport and start your journey without delays. Airport Fast Track provides a digital solution enabling cardholders to skip the security queue across top EU, Turkey & Asia airports via pre-booking their priority service through Travel Pass App, making travelling safer, time-saving and more convenient. Know more More advantages exclusively for you Choose from our flexible financial options: Balance Conversion Convert your current retail outstanding balance into affordable monthly installments. Loan on Card within credit limit Get quick access to cash with your Emirates NBD Credit Card—no paperwork, no hassle. Installment Payment Plan Turn all your purchases into easy monthly installments (EMIs). Perfect for big purchases, travel expenses and more. Balance Transfer Transfer your Credit Card balance from other Banks to your Emirates NBD Credit Card and enjoy lower interest and smaller monthly payments. Loan Beyond Credit Limit Take advantage of additional cash above your Credit Card limit Fees and charges Minimum salary: AED 25,000 Joining fee: NIL Annual fee: AED 1,500 Easy installment plans Shop to your heart's content, pay back in small amounts! Buy electronics, jewelry, home décor, travel and entertainment tickets at participating merchants and pay it back in 3, 6, 12 or 24 months with 0% interest. Learn more Airport Lounge Access Complimentary lounge access worldwide with Mastercard Travel Pass. Know more Airport Lounge Access Complimentary lounge access worldwide with Mastercard Travel Pass. Enjoy free access to some of the world’s best airport lounges every time you travel. Explore a selection of lounges across global Airport destinations and enjoy privileges, latest updates and much more on the app with your Emirates NBD Mastercard. Learn more Earn 275,000+ Voyager Miles in your first year and unlock over AED 3,483 in annual travel savings Save AED 1,346 on Visa services annually provided by OneVasco Save AED 1,152 on both international and domestic airport transfers Save AED 235 with unlimited complimentary access for 1,000 plus airport lounges available worldwide Save AED 350 on car rental and chauffeur service Save AED 400 on travel insurance Know more Save AED 4,020 annually with lifestyle perks including golf, cinema, valet, and exclusive memberships Save AED 2,400 by enjoying complimentary golf across select Golf Courses in the UAE Save AED 660 on Movie Experiences Save AED 600 by using year round dining offers Save AED 360 on Valet Parking at select locations in Abu Dhabi Know more Pay on the go with Emirates NBD Cards Make secure, cashless payments using your compatible phone or wearable. Know more More advantages exclusively for you Choose from our flexible financial options: Balance Conversion Convert your current retail outstanding balance into affordable monthly installments. Loan on Card within credit limit Get quick access to cash with your Emirates NBD Credit Card—no paperwork, no hassle. Installment Payment Plan Turn all your purchases into easy monthly installments (EMIs). Perfect for big purchases, travel expenses and more. Balance Transfer Transfer your Credit Card balance from other Banks to your Emirates NBD Credit Card and enjoy lower interest and smaller monthly payments. Loan Beyond Credit Limit Take advantage of additional cash above your Credit Card limit Fees and charges Minimum salary: AED 12,000 Joining fee: Free Annual fee: Free Easy installment plans Shop to your heart's content, pay back in small amounts! Buy electronics, jewelry, home décor, travel and entertainment tickets at participating merchants and pay it back in 3, 6, 12 or 24 months with 0% interest. English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / SHARE Visa Signature Credit Card SHARE Visa Signature Credit Card Your ultimate shopping companion that’s always by your side With over 5,000 stores across the UAE to redeem your SHARE Points at, this Card helps you save and shop smarter. Apply online and get Majid Al Futtaim Mall eGift Card by YOUGotaGift worth AED 350* Earn 6% back as SHARE Points Redeem points at over 5,000 stores Welcome bonus of 5,000 SHARE Points equal to AED 500 Get your Card instantly You will receive your Card instantly upon successful application *Terms and conditions SHARE Visa Signature Credit Card Benefits Welcome offer Earn and Redeem Activate your Card Get your Card instantly Key benefits and highlights Get a welcome bonus of 5,000 SHARE Points equal to AED 500 when you spend AED 25,000 in the first 3 months Earn 6% back as SHARE Points on shopping, dining, leisure and groceries at 5,000+ stores and 18 malls across the UAE Earn 1% back as SHARE Points on all other spends Redeem SHARE Points instantly at over 5,000 stores in Mall of the Emirates, all City Centre malls, Carrefour, VOX Cinemas and much more Welcome offer Get rewarded with SHARE Points Earn 5,000 SHARE Points equal to AED 500 on spends of AED 25,000 in the first 3 months Free for Life Credit Card Your easy guide to applying for the SHARE Credit Card Online Watch quick tutorial to learn how to easily apply for SHARE Credit Card through our seamless journey. Watch here How you earn SHARE Points Spends category SHARE Points Earned Mall of the Emirates and all City Centre malls across the UAE 6 % Carrefour (in-store and online) 6 % Other retail, online and international spends 1% Grocery and supermarkets, fast-food restaurants, insurance and car dealerships (outside SHARE) + EU Spends (including UK) 0.25% Petroleum, transit, government services, utility payments, real estate, education and telecommunication 0.10% Earn and redeem your SHARE Points Across the SHARE ecosystem at 5,000 stores and 18 malls across the UAE 10 SHARE Points = AED 1 SHARE Points can be redeemed in the following ways: Link your SHARE Visa Credit Card to SHAREPay on the SHARE App Scan your SHARE ID in-store at Majid Al Futtaim brands Login with your SHARE credentials online at Majid Al Futtaim brands Purchase a Digital Mall Gift Card directly on the SHARE App Learn more about SHARE Points Movie benefits ‘Buy 1 get 1 free’ at VOX Cinemas Enjoy ‘buy 1 get 1 free’ movie ticket offers at Vox Cinemas with your Card Know more ‘Buy 1 get 1 free’ at VOX Cinemas Enjoy ‘buy 1 get 1 free’ movie ticket offers at Vox Cinemas with your Card Book online on the VOX Cinemas website or app and purchase the tickets with your credit card to avail the discount. *Minimum spend criteria applies. Redeem SHARE Points instantly at over 5,000 stores in Mall of the Emirates, all City Centre malls, Carrefour, VOX Cinemas and much more. English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / Darna Visa Infinite Credit Card Darna Visa Infinite Credit Card Experience the extraordinary Unlock a premium lifestyle with unmatched rewards, seamless redemption, and exclusive benefits. Apply online and get YOUGotaGift HappyYOU Card worth AED 500* Get up to 10% value back** Redeem instantly across 1,200 Aldar destinations Complimentary Darna Platinum tier status Apply now *Terms and conditions **As Darna Points Darna Visa Infinite Credit Card Benefits Welcome offer Earn & Redeem Get your card Key benefits and highlights Darna Membership Enjoy exclusive benefits and offers included with automatic Darna Platinum tier status Darna Points 10 Darna Points = AED 1 on redemption with your Emirates NBD Darna Credit Card 0% Installment Plan 0% Installment Plan at no cost across Aldar Education & Property Golf Privileges Complimentary access to top golf courses across the UAE Roadside Assistance Complimentary roadside assistance including recovery, towing, fuel delivery and battery boost Valet Parking Complimentary valet parking at select Abu Dhabi locations for your convenience Welcome offer Earn up to 15,000 Darna Points Welcome Bonus Earn 7,500 Darna Points on payment of joining fee Spends Bonus Earn 7,500 Darna Points when you spend AED 20,000 in first 3 months Earn & Redeem Darna Points Get 10% value back as Darna Points on all spends at Aldar destinations including Yas Mall, Yas Island theme parks,  hotels, spas, golf courses and other iconic Abu Dhabi attractions Get 1.5% value back as Darna Points on Card spends outside Aldar destinations Redeem Darna Points instantly at over 1,200 Aldar destinations Redeeming made simple 10 Darna Points = AED 1 upon redemption Steps to Redeem: Step 1 Check your Darna Points balance on your Darna app or ENBD X App. Step 2 Inform the cashier that you want to redeem Darna Points. Insert your card into the POS terminal and choose between ENBD VISA and Darna Points . Step 3 Select ENBD VISA for standard transactions or Darna Points for redemption of your Darna Points . For partial redemptions, split the amount into two transactions as needed. Earn and redeem your Darna Points at participating Darna Partners Darna Platinum Membership Get automatic Darna Platinum tier status Know more Get automatic Darna Platinum tier status Enjoy a complimentary Darna Rewards by Aldar Platinum membership that brings you exclusive benefits across Aldar*: Dedicated parking at Yas Mall. Up to 40% off hotel stays and 30% off dining at Aldhafra Resort, Crowne Plaza Abu Dhabi - Yas Island, Radisson Blu Yas Island, Yas Island Rotana, Centro Yas Island, Park Inn by Radisson Abu Dhabi - Yas Island and Staybridge Suites Abu Dhabi - Yas Island. Discounts of up to 30% on access to Saadiyat Beach Club and Kai Beach. Discounts on golf sessions, padel tennis, and country clubs. *These benefits are only a summary of the full suite of benefits offered by the Darna program and are subject to change by Darna according to their terms and conditions. Please refer to your Darna App for a comprehensive guide to your Darna tier benefits. Airport Lounge Access Complimentary lounge access with Visa Airport Companion App Know more Complimentary lounge access with Visa Airport Companion App Travel in style with the new Visa Airport Companion App. Explore a selection of lounges across global airport destinations and enjoy privileges, latest updates and much more on the app with your Emirates NBD Visa Card. Learn more Movie benefits 'Buy 1 get 1 free' on movie tickets Know more 'Buy 1 get 1 free' on movie tickets Watch the latest movies with a buy 1 get 1 free* ticket offer. Book online on the VOX Cinemas website or app and purchase the tickets with your Credit Card to avail the discount. *Minimum spend criteria applies. Learn more Golf Privileges Enjoy free golf in the UAE and up to 40% discount at premium golf courses worldwide Know more Enjoy free golf in the UAE and up to 40% discount at premium golf courses worldwide Enjoy a relaxing day with complimentary* access to top golf courses across the UAE. Arabian Ranches Golf Club Jebel Ali Golf Club Track Meydan Abu Dhabi City Club Abu Dhabi Golf Club Sharjah Golf & Shooting Club A processing fee of AED 30 per booking and no-show fees apply. Charges vary from course to course. *Minimum spend criteria applies. Learn more Pay on the go with Emirates NBD Cards Make secure, cashless payments using your compatible phone or wearable. Know more New Credit Shield Pro Secure your life with enhanced benefits 0.99% Monthly fee of your Card's outstanding balance Up to AED 300,000 Decease cover per cardholder AED 100 Pay out per day in case of hospitalization Up to AED 60,000 Job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment Learn more Easy installment plans Shop to your heart's content, pay back in small amounts! Buy electronics, jewelry, home décor, travel and entertainment tickets at participating merchants and pay it back in 3, 6, 12 or 24 months with 0% interest. English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / Darna Visa Signature Credit Card Darna Visa Signature Credit Card Your key to savouring every moment Unlock a premium lifestyle with unmatched rewards, seamless redemption, and exclusive benefits. Apply online and get YOUGotaGift HappyYOU Card worth AED 350* Get up to 7.5% value back** Redeem instantly across 1,200 Aldar destinations Complimentary Darna Gold tier status Apply now *Terms and conditions **As Darna Points Darna Visa Signature Credit Card Benefits Welcome offer Earn & Redeem Get your card Key benefits and highlights Darna Membership Enjoy exclusive benefits and offers included with automatic Darna Gold tier status Darna Points 10 Darna Points = AED 1 on redemption with your Emirates NBD Darna Credit Card 0% Installment Plan 0% Installment Plan at no cost across Aldar Education & Property Roadside Assistance Complimentary roadside assistance including recovery, towing, fuel delivery and battery boost Welcome offer Earn 3,000 Darna Points Spends Bonus Earn 3,000 Darna Points when you spend AED 15,000 in first 3 months Free for life Free for life for a limited time only Earn & Redeem Darna Points Get 7.5% value back as Darna Points on all spends at Aldar destinations including Yas Mall, Yas Island theme parks,  hotels, spas, golf courses and other iconic Abu Dhabi attractions Get 1% value back as Darna Points on Card spends outside Aldar destinations Redeem Darna Points instantly at over 1,200 Aldar destinations Redeeming made simple 10 Darna Points = AED 1 upon redemption Steps to Redeem: Step 1 Check your Darna Points balance on your Darna app or ENBD X App. Step 2 Inform the cashier that you want to redeem Darna Points. Insert your card into the POS terminal and choose between ENBD VISA and Darna Points . Step 3 Select ENBD VISA for standard transactions or Darna Points for redemption of your Darna Points . For partial redemptions, split the amount into two transactions as needed. Earn and redeem your Darna Points at participating Darna Partners Darna Gold Membership Get automatic Darna Gold tier status Enjoy a complimentary Darna Rewards by Aldar Gold membership that brings you exclusive benefits across Aldar*: Up to 30% off hotel stays and 20% off dining at select hotels Discounts on golf sessions, padel tennis, and country clubs *These benefits are only a summary of the full suite of benefits offered by the Darna program and are subject to change by Darna according to their terms and conditions. Please refer to your Darna App for a comprehensive guide to your Darna tier benefits. Airport Lounge Access Complimentary lounge access with Visa Airport Companion App Know more Complimentary lounge access with Visa Airport Companion App Travel in style with the new Visa Airport Companion App. Explore a selection of lounges across global airport destinations and enjoy privileges, latest updates and much more on the app with your Emirates NBD Visa Card. Learn more Movie benefits 'Buy 1 get 1 free' on movie tickets Know more 'Buy 1 get 1 free' on movie tickets Watch the latest movies with a buy 1 get 1 free* ticket offer. Book online on the VOX Cinemas website or app and purchase the tickets with your Credit Card to avail the discount. *Minimum spend criteria applies. Learn more Pay on the go with Emirates NBD Cards Make secure, cashless payments using your compatible phone or wearable. Know more New Credit Shield Pro Secure your life with enhanced benefits 0.99% Monthly fee of your Card's outstanding balance Up to AED 300,000 Decease cover per cardholder AED 100 Pay out per day in case of hospitalization Up to AED 60,000 Job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment Learn more Easy installment plans Shop to your heart's content, pay back in small amounts! Buy electronics, jewelry, home décor, travel and entertainment tickets at participating merchants and pay it back in 3, 6, 12 or 24 months with 0% interest. English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / Darna Select Visa Credit Card Darna Select Visa Credit Card Your key to unforgettable moments Unlock a premium lifestyle with unmatched rewards, seamless redemption, and exclusive benefits. Apply online and get YOUGotaGift HappyYOU Card worth AED 250* Get up to 6.25% value back** Redeem instantly across 1,200 Aldar destinations Complimentary Darna Silver tier status Apply now *Terms and conditions **As Darna Points Darna Select Visa Credit Card Benefits Earn & Redeem Get your card Key benefits and highlights Darna Membership Enjoy exclusive benefits and offers included with automatic Darna Silver tier status Darna Points 10 Darna Points = AED 1 on redemption with your Emirates NBD Darna Visa Credit Card 0% Installment Plan 0% Installment Plan at no cost across Aldar Education & Property Earn & Redeem Darna Points Get 6.25% value back as Darna Points on all spends at Aldar destinations including Yas Mall, Yas Island theme parks, hotels, spas, golf courses and other Iconic Abu Dhabi attractions. Get 0.75% value back as Darna Points on Card spends outside Aldar destinations Redeem Darna Points instantly at over 1,200 Aldar destinations Redeeming made simple 10 Darna Points = AED 1 upon redemption Steps to Redeem: Step 1 Check your Darna Points balance on your Darna app or ENBD X App. Step 2 Inform the cashier that you want to redeem Darna Points. Insert your card into the POS terminal and choose between ENBD VISA and Darna Points . Step 3 Select ENBD VISA for standard transactions or Darna Points for redemption of your Darna Points . For partial redemptions, split the amount into two transactions as needed. Earn and redeem your Darna Points at participating Darna Partners Darna Silver Membership Get automatic Darna Silver tier status Know more Get automatic Darna Silver tier status Enjoy a complimentary Darna Rewards by Aldar Silver membership that brings you exclusive benefits across Aldar*: Up to 15% off dining at Aldhafra Resort, Crowne Plaza Yas Island, Radisson Blu Yas Island, Rotana Abu Dhabi Yas Island, Centro Yas Island, Park Inn by Radisson Yas Island and Staybridge Suites Yas Island. Discounts on golf sessions, padel tennis, and country clubs. *These benefits are only a summary of the full suite of benefits offered by the Darna program and are subject to change by Darna according to their terms and conditions. Please refer to your Darna App for a comprehensive guide to your Darna tier benefits. Movie benefits 'Buy 1 get 1 free' on movie tickets Know more 'Buy 1 get 1 free' on movie tickets Watch the latest movies with a buy 1 get 1 free* ticket offer. Book online on the VOX Cinemas website or app and purchase the tickets with your Credit Card to avail the discount. *Minimum spend criteria applies. Learn more Pay on the go with Emirates NBD Cards Make secure, cashless payments using your compatible phone or wearable. Buy electronics, jewelry, home décor, travel and entertainment tickets at participating merchants and pay it back in 3, 6, 12 or 24 months with 0% interest. You can enroll into the Express Points* programme by paying a monthly fee of AED300. Cardmembers enrolled in the Express Points programme will not be charged the annual fee. For example, if you earn a total of 8,000 points for your domestic and international spending in a given month, then you earn Express Points as shown below: Regular points: 8,000 Express Points: 4,000 Total points earned for the month: 12,000 1. Additional rewards: This is in addition to the points you’ll earn from the loyalty programme. Please click here for full terms. 2. International spend is any transaction made internationally in Foreign/non-AED Currency. Spend made on merchants located in European Union and United Kingdom earn 50% of the international spend points. 3. In a given statement cycle, points can be earned for all eligible spend and will be calculated based on category of spend as defined by Mastercard. The Bank or Marriott International are not responsible for merchants categorization. 4. Spend made under the category quick service restaurants (i.e., fast-food restaurants) will earn 3 points per US$1 spent if the value of the transaction is above US$25. Earn 1 Free Night Award valued at 35,000 points each* Earn up to 3 Marriott Bonvoy Points per US$1 spent Automatic Silver Elite status and a fast track to Gold Elite status Get your card now! Marriott Bonvoy® World Mastercard® At a glance Benefits Requirements Key facts statement Support Card Activation Get your card Enjoy rich travel benefits with Marriott Bonvoy Earn up to 3 points per US$1 spent Upgrade to Marriott Bonvoy Elite status Where can Marriott Bonvoy points take me? Redeem points for nights at over 30 hotel brands and 10,000 global destinations including: The Ritz-Carlton Maldives, Fari Islands The West Hollywood EDITION, Los Angeles W Rome JW Marriott Masai Mara Lodge The St. Regis Dubai, The Palm The St. Regis Mumbai W Dubai - The Palm Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach Renaissance Bali Uluwatu Resort & Spa The Westin Goa JW Marriott Hotel Cairo The above is an indication of where you can redeem your earned Marriott Bonvoy Points and these are subject to applicable terms and conditions of the hotels & resorts participating in Marriott Bonvoy and the Marriott Bonvoy loyalty programme. Click here for full terms and conditions. Benefits of your Marriott Bonvoy ® World Mastercard ® Credit Card Marriott Bonvoy Elite Status Receive automatic Silver Elite status and a fast track to Gold Elite status Know more Marriott Bonvoy Elite Status Receive automatic Silver Elite status and a fast track to Gold Elite status Marriott Bonvoy Silver Elite  status Enjoy  complimentary Silver Elite status and benefits, such as: 10%  bonus points on stays Priority  Late Checkout Discounted  Member Rates and Free Wi-Fi Marriott Bonvoy Gold Elite  status Unlock  next-level benefits when you spend US$40,000 annually on the Card. Benefits  include: 25%  bonus points on stays Enhanced  Room Upgrade 2 PM  Late Checkout Elite Night Credits Each calendar year receive 10 Elite Night Credits towards the next level of Marriott Bonvoy Elite status Know more Elite Night Credits Each calendar year receive 10 Elite Night Credits towards the next level of Marriott Bonvoy Elite status Elite Night Credits are the number of Qualifying Nights that you will earn when you stay at hotels participating in Marriott Bonvoy. You will earn one Elite Night Credit* (ENC) for each completed Qualifying Night. Earning Elite Night Credits (ENCs) help you earn Elite Status. With the 10 ENCs that you may receive from your Credit Card, you will only need to complete 15 Qualifying Nights to achieve Gold Elite status, instead of 25 Qualifying Nights. Additional Free Night Award Receive 1 Free Night Award valued at 35,000 Marriott Bonvoy points on Card anniversary Know more Additional Free Night Award Receive 1 Free Night Award valued at 35,000 Marriott Bonvoy points on Card anniversary Receive an additional Free Night Award every year after your Credit Card account anniversary. Award can be used for one night (redemption level at or under 35,000 Marriott Bonvoy points) at participating hotels. Additionally, the value of your Free Night Award can be combined with up to 15,000 points to help you access even more hotels you'll love. Certain hotels have resort fees. Complimentary lounge access worldwide with Mastercard Travel Pass. Enjoy free access to some of the world’s best airport lounges every time you travel. Know more Complimentary lounge access worldwide with Mastercard Travel Pass. Enjoy free access to some of the world’s best airport lounges every time you travel. Travel in style with the Mastercard Travel App Explore a selection of lounges across global Airport destinations and enjoy privileges, latest updates and much more on the app with your Emirates NBD Mastercard Starting 1st May 2025 to continue enjoying the airport lounge benefit, you will need to be registered on the Mastercard Travel App Know more Movie benefits Enjoy movie benefits on your card! Buy 1 get 1 free on movies Know more Enjoy movie benefits on your card! Buy 1 get 1 free on movies Watch the latest movies with a buy-one-get-one ticket free* ticket offer. VOX Cinema Book online on the VOX Cinema website or app and purchase with your credit card to avail the discount. Know more Reel Cinema Book online on the Reel Cinema website, digital kiosk or app and purchase with your credit card to avail the discount Know more *Minimum spend criteria applies. Earn points on dining without stays Earn points for dining at participating restaurants even without stays. Unlock delicious deals and discover the best 2 for 1 offers and venues near you with the More Cravings app by Marriott Bonvoy. Know more Earn points on dining without stays Earn points for dining at participating restaurants even without stays. Unlock delicious deals and discover the best 2 for 1 offers and venues near you with the More Cravings app by Marriott Bonvoy. Discover Participating Restaurants At a glance Minimum salary: AED 12,000 Joining fees: 315Annual fees: AED 315 Welcome Offer Receive 1 Free Night Award on cumulative retail spends of US$ 6,000 in the first 3 billing statements from Card issuance. Each Free Night Award can be redeemed for  a one-night stay at participating Marriott Bonvoy hotels with a redemption  level at or under 35,000 Marriott Bonvoy points. Additionally, the value of  your Free Night Award can be combined with up to 15,000 points to help you  access even more hotels you'll love. Marriott Bonvoy programme  terms and conditions apply. Marriott  Bonvoy Points Earning 3 Marriott Bonvoy points per US$1 on  spend at hotels and resorts participating in Marriott Bonvoy. 1 Earn up to 1.5 Marriott Bonvoy  points per US$1 on international spend. 2 Earn up to 1.5 Marriott Bonvoy points per  US$1 on general domestic spend. 3 1.5 points per US$1 on general retail  shopping (e.g.  apparel, dining, etc.) 0.375 points per US$1 on grocery and  supermarkets, insurance, car dealership related, and quick-service restaurants  (i.e., fast-food restaurants) 4 0.15 points per US$1 on real estate,  education, petroleum, government services, car-hailing services, food delivery  aggregators, and bill payments (including utility and telecommunication) 1. Additional rewards: This is in addition to the points you’ll earn from  the loyalty programme. Please click here for full terms 2. International spend is any transaction made internationally in  Foreign/non-AED Currency. Spend made on merchants located in European Union and  United Kingdom earn 50% of the international spend points. 3. In a given statement cycle, points can be  earned for all eligible spend and will be calculated based on category of spend  as defined by Mastercard. The Bank or Marriott International are not  responsible for merchants categorization. 4. Spend made under the category quick service restaurants (i.e.,  fast-food restaurants) will earn 1.5 points per US$1 spent if the value of the  transaction is above US$25. Calculate your rewards How much do you usually spend per month on Hotels participating in Marriott Bonvoy? International spends? Retail and dining Supermarkets and Groceries? Fuel and Utility Payments? Education, telecom, real estate and other payments? If you are an existing Etihad Guest Silver, Gold or Platinum member, your existing membership status will not be affected. *Upon completing one (1) return flight (excluding redemption flight) on Etihad Airways within 6 months of card issuance, customer will be fast tracked to Etihad Guest Gold Tier. Fast track will be processed as soon as the member completed his/her return flight. This privilege applies only to Principal Card holders. All Etihad Guest tier levels are governed by the terms and conditions of the Etihad Guest. Visit our Help & Support section for answers to your queries. Other credit cards Looking for something different? LuLu 247 Platinum Credit Card Earn up to 7% back as LuLu Points on your daily spends and with no minimum spend requirement Know more U by Emaar Family Credit Card A Credit Card that rewards you with enriching experiences everyday Know more SKYWARDS MILES Now your spends are your ticket to more travels Maximum eligible spends In a given statement cycle, Miles can be earned for eligible spends up to the credit limit, or AED 100,000 for Skywards Infinite Card / AED 50,000 for Skywards Signature Card, whichever is lower. Miles will be awarded for eligible transactions in chronological order up to the credit limit or above stated cap, whichever is lower. Retail spends Grocery and supermarkets, fast food restaurants, insurance, car dealership earn 25% of domestic spends* Petroleum, transit, government services, utility payments, real estate, education & telecommunications payments earn 10% of the domestic spends* Duty free, online food delivery and car booking apps Domestic and international Duty free spends, domestic online food delivery and car booking apps spends earn 2 Miles per USD equivalent; spend on Skywards Infinite Card. 1.5 Miles per USD equivalent spend on Skywards Signature Card International spends Spends made abroad on groceries and supermarkets, insurance, car dealerships, fast food, real estate, education, petrol, government services and utility payments including telecom, earn Miles as per normal international spends. Retail spends on merchants in the EU earn 50% of the international spends. Express Miles Cardholders enrolled in the ‘50% more Express Miles every month programme’ are eligible to earn Express Miles. This is subject to a maximum of 4,000 additional Miles per statement. A nominal monthly fee of AED 250 is charged for the Express Miles programme. The listed annual fee of AED 1,500 is waived from the 2nd year onwards for cardholders enrolled into the Express Miles Programme. Bonus Miles for spends on www.emirates.ae are excluded for Express Miles calculation. Introducing the new Credit Shield Pro, our enhanced insurance product, underwritten by Abu Dhabi National Insurance Company, that brings you even more benefits and extended coverage. Visit our Help & Support section for answers to your queries. Other credit cards Looking for something different? LuLu 247 Platinum Credit Card Earn up to 7% back as LuLu Points on your daily spends and with no minimum spend requirement Know more U by Emaar Family Credit Card A Credit Card that rewards you with enriching experiences everyday Know more SKYWARDS MILES Now your spends are your ticket to more travels Maximum eligible spends In a given statement cycle, Miles can be earned for eligible spends up to the credit limit, or AED 100,000 for Skywards Infinite Card / AED 50,000 for Skywards Signature Card, whichever is lower. Miles will be awarded for eligible transactions in chronological order up to the credit limit or above stated cap, whichever is lower. Retail spends Grocery and supermarkets, fast food restaurants, insurance, car dealership earn 25% of domestic spends* Petroleum, transit, government services, utility payments, real estate, education & telecommunications payments earn 10% of the domestic spends* Duty free, online food delivery and car booking apps Domestic and international Duty free spends, domestic online food delivery and car booking apps spends earn 2 Miles per USD equivalent; spend on Skywards Infinite Card. 1.5 Miles per USD equivalent spend on Skywards Signature Card International spends Spends made abroad on groceries and supermarkets, insurance, car dealerships, fast food, real estate, education, petrol, government services and utility payments including telecom, earn Miles as per normal international spends. Retail spends on merchants in the EU earn 50% of the international spends. Express Miles Cardholders enrolled in the ‘50% more Express Miles every month programme’ are eligible to earn Express Miles. This is subject to a maximum of 4,000 additional Miles per statement. A nominal monthly fee of AED 250 is charged for the Express Miles programme. The listed annual fee of AED 1,500 is waived from the 2nd year onwards for cardholders enrolled into the Express Miles Programme. Bonus Miles for spends on www.emirates.ae are excluded for Express Miles calculation. Introducing the new Credit Shield Pro, our enhanced insurance product, underwritten by Abu Dhabi National Insurance Company, that brings you even more benefits and extended coverage. Key features 0.99% monthly fee of your card's outstanding balance Up to AED 300,000 decease cover per cardholder AED 100 pay out per day in case of hospitalization Up to AED 60,000 job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment Learn more about enrolling into Credit Shield Pro and other terms and conditions Thank you for your feedback! best Credit Cards in the UAE. From the discount on dining to easy instalment plans and cash on Card" Gnew Weng Apply for your card Support We're here for you Our fees & charges Fraud & security Help with your payments Key Facts Statement Apply Apply for a Credit Card Receiving your Card Pay your Credit Card dues in installments Balance Transfer Rewards & Benefits Understanding your rewards Request help Reset your PIN Update your info Update your phone number Everyday banking Cardless cash withdrawal Have a question? Visit our Help & Support section for answers to your queries. Other credit cards Looking for something different? LuLu 247 Platinum Credit Card Earn up to 7% back as LuLu Points on your daily spends and with no minimum spend requirement Know more U by Emaar Family Credit Card A Credit Card that rewards you with enriching experiences everyday Know more SKYWARDS MILES Now your spends are your ticket to more travels Maximum eligible spends In a given statement cycle, Miles can be earned for eligible spends up to the credit limit, or AED 100,000 for Skywards Infinite Card / AED 50,000 for Skywards Signature Card, whichever is lower. Miles will be awarded for eligible transactions in chronological order up to the credit limit or above stated cap, whichever is lower. Retail spends Grocery and supermarkets, fast food restaurants, insurance, car dealership earn 25% of domestic spends* Petroleum, transit, government services, utility payments, real estate, education & telecommunications payments earn 10% of the domestic spends* Duty free, online food delivery and car booking apps Domestic and international Duty free spends, domestic online food delivery and car booking apps spends earn 2 Miles per USD equivalent; spend on Skywards Infinite Card. 1.5 Miles per USD equivalent spend on Skywards Signature Card International spends Spends made abroad on groceries and supermarkets, insurance, car dealerships, fast food, real estate, education, petrol, government services and utility payments including telecom, earn Miles as per normal international spends. Retail spends on merchants in the EU earn 50% of the international spends. Express Miles Cardholders enrolled in the ‘50% more Express Miles every month programme’ are eligible to earn Express Miles. This is subject to a maximum of 4,000 additional Miles per statement. A nominal monthly fee of AED 250 is charged for the Express Miles programme. The listed annual fee of AED 1,500 is waived from the 2nd year onwards for cardholders enrolled into the Express Miles Programme. Bonus Miles for spends on www.emirates.ae are excluded for Express Miles calculation. Introducing the new Credit Shield Pro, our enhanced insurance product, underwritten by Abu Dhabi National Insurance Company, that brings you even more benefits and extended coverage. Key features 0.99% monthly fee of your card's outstanding balance Up to AED 300,000 decease cover per cardholder AED 100 pay out per day in case of hospitalization Up to AED 60,000 job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment Learn more about enrolling into Credit Shield Pro and other terms and conditions Thank you for your feedback! How was your experience? LuLu 247 Platinum Credit Card Earn up to 7% back as LuLu Points on your daily spends and with no minimum spend requirement Know more U by Emaar Family Credit Card A Credit Card that rewards you with enriching experiences everyday Know more Now your spends are your ticket to more travels Maximum eligible spends In a given statement cycle, Miles can be earned for eligible spends up to the credit limit, or AED 100,000 for Skywards Infinite Card / AED 50,000 for Skywards Signature Card, whichever is lower. Miles will be awarded for eligible transactions in chronological order up to the credit limit or above stated cap, whichever is lower. Retail spends Grocery and supermarkets, fast food restaurants, insurance, car dealership earn 25% of domestic spends* Petroleum, transit, government services, utility payments, real estate, education & telecommunications payments earn 10% of the domestic spends* Duty free, online food delivery and car booking apps Domestic and international Duty free spends, domestic online food delivery and car booking apps spends earn 2 Miles per USD equivalent; spend on Skywards Infinite Card. 1.5 Miles per USD equivalent spend on Skywards Signature Card International spends Spends made abroad on groceries and supermarkets, insurance, car dealerships, fast food, real estate, education, petrol, government services and utility payments including telecom, earn Miles as per normal international spends. Retail spends on merchants in the EU earn 50% of the international spends. Express Miles Cardholders enrolled in the ‘50% more Express Miles every month programme’ are eligible to earn Express Miles. This is subject to a maximum of 4,000 additional Miles per statement. A nominal monthly fee of AED 250 is charged for the Express Miles programme. The listed annual fee of AED 1,500 is waived from the 2nd year onwards for cardholders enrolled into the Express Miles Programme. Bonus Miles for spends on Emirates website are excluded for Express Miles calculation. English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / noon One Visa Credit Card noon One Visa Credit Card More savings, delivered. A Credit Card that offers special discounts across a multitude of e-commerce platforms and rewards you for spending on your lifestyle. Apply online and get YOUGotaGift HappyYOU Card worth AED 250* Earn on noon platforms Earn up to 20% back as noon credits on your spends across all noon platforms Free noon One membership 1-year free noon One membership & 50% off thereafter Earn on all your spends Earn up to 1% on all other spends Apply now You will receive your Card instantly upon successful application * Terms and conditions Benefits Requirements Key Facts Statement Support Card Activation Get your card Introducing Emirates NBD noon One Visa Credit Card Earn up to 20% back as noon credits on your spends across all noon platforms, including: Earn up to AED 2,000 back every month noon Food Get 20% back as noon credits when you order food noon Minutes Get 5% back as noon credits on all orders. 15% discount on non electronics - 5 orders per month up to AED 30 NowNow Get 10% back as noon credits noon Get 5% back as noon credits Namshi Get 5% back as noon credits supermall Get 5% back as noon credits Welcome bonus Get a welcome bonus* of AED 500 when you spend AED 5,000 on the card in the first two months *Applicable only for new to bank/new to card customers. There's even more… Buy one get one free on movie experiences Watch blockbusters for less with the "Buy 1 Get 1" offer at VOX Cinemas on movies up to 3 tickets a month when you spend AED 3,500 monthly on the card 0% Installment Plans Enjoy an easy installment plan on your spends. Key features 0.99% monthly fee of your card's outstanding balance Up to AED 300,000 decease cover per cardholder AED 100 pay out per day in case of hospitalization Up to AED 60,000 job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment Learn more about enrolling into Credit Shield Pro and other terms and conditions Thank you for your feedback! How was your experience? First year free Earn up to 7.5% back on your spends Redeem Upoints at 2,000+ outlets Apply now U by Emaar Visa Infinite Emirati Credit Card Benefits Requirements Key Facts Statement Support Card Activation Get your card Key benefits and highlights Receive U by Emaar Platinum status Get 20% off on F&B and spas at Emaar Hospitality Group Hotels Concierge services to take care of your time-consuming errands Up to 30% discount on entertainment at Emaar Entertainment Group Complimentary upgrade to a suite on hotel stays Interest rate of 3.25% per month; minimum payment: 5% of the outstanding or AED 100, whichever is higher Buy 1 get 1 free on movie tickets at Reel Cinemas Complimentary airport lounge access to over 1000 lounges worldwide via the Visa Airport Companion App Complimentary Valet Parking at the Grand Drive for Galeries Lafayette,The Souk in Dubai Mall and the China Town Valet Area* * Effective 1 May 2025, valet parking at Grand Drive, Dubai Mall, will be unavailable due to ongoing expansion work. U by Emaar Visa Infinite Emirati Credit Cardholders will be redirected to the China Town valet area. *Starting 25 January 2025, Valet Parking will be accessible via the U by Emaar App. Simply generate an OTP in the app, which will be verified by the valet parking staff. English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / Visa Flexi Credit Card Visa Flexi Credit Card Make your credit card as unique as you! Introducing the Visa Flexi Credit Card – this first-of-its-kind card allows you to choose the benefits that matter the most to you Plus Points 1.5% rewards on all retail spends Personalize your benefit Choose from a variety of Travel, Lifestyle and Entertainment options Complimentary access to 900+ airport lounges Apply now Choose your benefits Visa Flexi Credit Card At a glance Benefits Requirements Key facts statement Support Card Activation Get your card At a glance Get rewarded for all your retail spends Minimum salary: AED 12,000 Free insurance for big ticket purchases Exclusive current offer: No Annual Fees Key benefits and highlights Plus Points 1.5 Points for every AED 100 spend 0.4% Points for supermarkets, groceries, insurance and car dealership spends 0.2% Points for fuel, utility bill payments, real estate and education spends Plus Points earning cap per statement is applicable. Click here to know more Interest rate of 3.25% per month; minimum payment: 5% of the outstanding, or AED 100, whichever is higher Interest-free period up to 55 days on retail purchases and fees and charges Calculate your rewards How much do you usually spend per month on... Supermarkets and groceries? Insurance and car dealership? Fuel and utility payments? Real estate and education? Retail and other expenses? With Emirates NBD Visa Flexi Credit Card, you could earn Plus Points per year Please note that this is a just estimated calculation based on above amounts Emirates NBD Credit Cards come with a wide range of benefits.
On top of that, your Visa Flexi Credit Card truly understands your world and gives you the freedom to customise and choose the benefits that suit your lifestyle. Choose 3 out of 5 Travel benefits Airport lounge Complimentary access to 900+ airport lounges Global Blue Exclusive member benefits on hassle-free tax refunds Airport transfers Complimentary transfers to the airport & back Flight delay lounge Access to special lounges in case of flight delays eSIM Complimentary 3GB eSim global data roaming Select 2 out of 4 Lifestyle perks Careem Discounts on rides, food deliveries and groceries Golf privileges Complimentary rounds of golf in the UAE SupperClub 12 months Signature Premium Dining membership Concierge Complimentary assistance for all your needs Pick 1 out of 3 Entertainment treats Anghami 6 months complimentary subscription STARZPLAY 3 months free entertainment and sports subscription VOX Cinemas Discounts on THEATRE and 4DX movie experiences Pay on the go with Emirates NBD Cards Make secure, cashless payments using your compatible phone or wearable. English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / Duo Credit Cards Duo Credit Card 2 cards with twice the benefits Get a benefit-packed experience by owning both the Diners Club and Mastercard Platinum Credit Card – all in one package Earn Plus Points on grocery, electronics, utilities, education and fuel Complimentary golf access Complimentary access to top golf courses across the UAE Buy 1 get 1 offer on tickets at Royal Cinemas Bring out your inner movie buff Apply now Duo Credit Card At a glance Benefits Requirements Key facts statement Support Card Activation Get your card At a glance Watch your rewards add up as you spend Minimum salary: AED 12,000 Exclusive for Abu Dhabi residents Exclusive current offer: No Annual Fees Key benefits and highlights Good things come in pairs. Earn Plus Points on spends 5% Plus Points on grocery, electronics, utilities, education and fuel* 0.5% Plus Points on other spends including travel, dining, hotels and online You’ll get two cards - a Diners Club and a Mastercard credit card, so you can benefit from the offers from both Buy 1 get 1 movie ticket free offer on Royal Cinemas Complimentary airport lounge access across the world Concierge services to take care of your time-consuming errands Complimentary access to top golf courses across the UAE 0% Easy Payment Plans at select Merchant Outlets Utility bill payments facility * Effective 5 th April 2025 : A minimum monthly spend of AED 5,000 per statement is required to earn 5% Plus Points on Grocery, Electronics, Utilities, Education and Fuel categories. If the minimum monthly spend is not met, you will earn 1.5% Plus Points. For all other categories, 0.5% Plus Points will continue to remain applicable. Maximum Plus Points per statement will be capped at 500. Airport transfers and Valet Parking will be discontinued. Benefits of your Duo Credit Cards Airport lounge access Complimentary lounge access Premium lounge access worldwide with your Diners Club and Mastercard cards Know more Complimentary lounge access Premium lounge access worldwide with your Diners Club and Mastercard cards Use both your Diners and Mastercard credit card to gain access to over 300 airport lounges across the Middle East and over 1,500 lounges across the world*. Mastercard lounge access Indulge in over 25 regional and international LoungeKey, marhaba and CAC lounges across the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Jordan, Kuwait, Egypt, Morocco, USA, UK, Canada, Germany, France, Singapore and more, no matter which airline or airline class you're travelling in. Simply present your Mastercard credit card at any participating LoungeKey Program airport lounge and enter immediately. Supplementary cardholders can use this benefit too. Enjoy complimentary visits for self. Additional guests will be charged extra. Learn more about activating Lounge Key and other terms & conditions Diners Club lounge access Indulge in over 1,500 comfortable premium lounges in more than 700 cities worldwide. Simply present your Diners Club card at any participating airport lounge and enter immediately, no matter which airline or airline class you're travelling in. Supplementary cardholders can use this benefit too. Enjoy complimentary visits for self*. Additional guests will be charged extra. *Minimum spend criteria applies. Learn more about claiming Diners Club benefits Pay on the go with Emirates NBD Cards Make secure, cashless payments using your compatible phone or wearable. Know more Movie offers Buy 1 get 1 offer on tickets at Cine Royals Cinemas You can get your tickets from the Cine Royals Cinemas website when you pay with your card Know more Buy 1 get 1 offer on tickets at Cine Royals Cinemas You can get your tickets from the Cine Royals Cinemas website when you pay with your card Benefits: AED 40.25 for two regular 2D Standard tickets. 15% discount on Food and Beverages purchased using the Eligible Card. Eligibility: Minimum Spend Criteria Applies. Cardholder can redeem up to 3 tickets per month. Service charges of AED 125/- + VAT will be applicable if the spend is below the required amount. Learn more about your Cine Royals Cinemas benefit Terms and Conditions: The Bank’s Emirates NBD Credit Cardholders, holding Emirates NBD Diners credit cards, (herein referred to as “Eligible Cardholders”), Get one 2D standard class movie tickets complimentary on purchase of the first one. The Offer will be valid for the purchase of one 2D standard class movie tickets to any show at any of the Cine Royal locations. The Offer shall also include 15% discount on Food and Beverages purchased using the Eligible Card. The customer has to show the ticket reference number to the snack bar counter. Subject to minimum purchase of AED 30. The Offer shall be available for purchases by the Eligible Cardholders through www.cineroyal.ae , through Cine Royal Mobile Application. Cardholders can avail a maximum of 3 (three) free tickets in a single transaction & maximum of 3 (three) free tickets per month. Movie tickets are subject to availability all tickets purchased in accordance with the Offer shall be utilized at the specific time and for the show they were purchased for, and shall not be carried forward for any other show on that or another day. This Offer shall not be valid in conjunction with any special promotion, private screening, or premiere at Cine Royal Cinemas. Golf privileges Tee off and conquer new terrain Swing, shank, press, hook and much more with complimentary access to top golfing locations across the UAE Know more Tee off and conquer new terrain Swing, shank, press, hook and much more with complimentary access to top golfing locations across the UAE Enjoy a relaxing day with complimentary* access to top golf courses across the UAE. Arabian Ranches Golf Club Jebel Ali Golf Club The Track, Meydan Golf Abu Dhabi City Golf Club Abu Dhabi Golf Club Sharjah Golf & Shooting Club A processing fee of AED 30 per booking and no-show fees apply. Charges vary from course to course. *Minimum spend criteria applies. Buy 1 get 1 free on movies Free rides on Dubai Ferry Experience the scenic sites and greatest landmarks of Dubai Apply now Go4it Platinum Credit Card At a glance Benefits Requirements Key facts statement Support Card Activation Get your card At a glance Now each unforgettable experience is more rewarding Minimum salary: AED 12,000 Complimentary life insurance Exclusive current offer: No Annual Fees Key benefits and highlights Get more convenience on the go Earn Plus Points on spends 5 points for every AED 200 spend on weekends 4 points for every AED 200 spend on RTA 1 point for every AED 200 spend on weekdays Plus Points earning cap per statement is applicable. Click here to know more Instant Plus points redemptions at key merchant outlets. Convert your Points to Frequent Flyer Miles or cash back. Access Gold Class on the Dubai Metro and pay your fare using your card Use your card like a Nol card on the Dubai Metro, RTA parking meters, busses and water bus stations and get an RTA monthly pass Buy one ticket and get one free at VOX Cinemas Enjoy free rides on Dubai Ferry 0% Easy Payment Plans at select Merchant Outlets Utility Bill Payments Facility Calculate your rewards How much do you usually spend per month on... With Emirates NBD Go4it Platinum Credit Card, you could earn Plus Points per year Please note that this is a just estimated calculation based on above amounts Benefits of your Go4it Platinum Credit Card Using your Go4it card For you, the light is always green Use your Go4it Card as the RTA Nol Card and a credit card Access to Gold Class and fare payment of Gold Class from Nol Tag ID Fare payments at RTA Parking Meters, RTA Bus and Water Bus Eligibility for RTA Monthly Pass/Product Know more For you, the light is always green Use your Go4it Card as the RTA Nol Card and a credit card Use your Go4it Gold credit card to make fare payments on the RTA transit network and parking meters and also for purchases and cash withdrawals. You'll also get a host of other benefits including: Access to Gold class and fare payment from Nol Tag ID Ability to make payments at RTA parking meters, bus and water bus Eligibility for RTA's monthly pass/product Learn more about how you can top up your Nol card in convenient ways Dubai Ferry Free rides on Dubai Ferry Experience the scenic sites and greatest landmarks of Dubai Know more Free rides on Dubai Ferry Experience the scenic sites and greatest landmarks of Dubai The Dubai Ferry takes round trips on the waterfront route providing incredible views of landmarks such as Old Bastakiya, Gold Souk, Jumeirah beach, World Islands, Burj Al Arab and others and is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities. Your Go4it Card entitles you and one accompanying guest to a free ride on the Dubai Ferry. The exclusive rides for Go4it Cardholders are as per the below schedule. Route Description Schedule* FR3 Round trip from Al Ghubaiba water transport station up to the area close to Burj Al Arab 2:30pm (for one hour), First Saturday of the month Round trip from Al Ghubaiba water transport station up to the area close to Burj Al Arab 2:30pm (for one hour), Second Saturday of the month FR4 Round trip from Marina Mall water transport station up to the area close to Atlantis on Palm Jumeirah 2:30pm (for one hour), Third Saturday of the month Round trip from Marina Mall water transport station up to the area close to Atlantis on Palm Jumeirah 2:30pm (for one hour), Fourth Saturday of the month Terms and conditions All passengers are requested to be at the location no later than 15 minutes before departure. English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / Go4it Gold Credit Card Go4it Gold Credit Card On the go with more convenience We bring you a world of convenience together with the Dubai Roads & Transport Authority – presenting the innovative Go4it Credit Card with a built-in transit chip Earn 5 points for every AED 400 spend on weekends Free rides on Dubai Ferry Experience the scenic sites and greatest landmarks of Dubai Free life insurance Apply now Go4it Gold Credit Card At a glance Benefits Requirements Key facts statement Support Card Activation Get your card At a glance We make your experiences even more rewarding Minimum salary: AED 5,000 Free life insurance Exclusive current offer: No Annual Fees Key benefits and highlights Get more convenience on the go Earn Plus Points on spends 5 points for every AED 400 spend on weekends 4 points for every AED 400 spend on RTA 1 points for every AED 400 spend on weekdays Plus Points earning cap per statement is applicable. Click here to know more Instant Plus points redemptions at key merchant outlets. Convert your Points to Frequent Flyer Miles or cashback Use your card like a Nol card on the Dubai Metro, RTA parking meters, buses and water bus stations and get an RTA monthly pass Enjoy free rides on Dubai Ferry 0% Easy Payment Plans at select Merchant Outlets Utility Bill Payments Facility Calculate your rewards How much do you usually spend per month on... Supermarkets and groceries? Insurance and car dealerships? Fuel and utility payments? Real estate and education? Retail and other expenses on weekdays? Retail and other expenses on weekends? RTA? With the Emirates NBD Go4it Gold Credit Card, you could earn: Plus Points per year Please note that this is a just estimated calculation based on above amounts Benefits of your Go4it Gold Credit Card Using your Go4it card For you, the light is always green Use your Go4it Card as the RTA Nol Card and a credit card Access to Regular class and fare payment of Regular Class from Nol Tag ID Fare payments at RTA Parking Meters, RTA Bus and Water Bus Eligibility for RTA Monthly Pass/Product Know more For you, the light is always green Use your Go4it Card as the RTA Nol Card and a credit card Use your Go4it Gold credit card to make fare payments on the RTA transit network and parking meters and also for purchases and cash withdrawals. You'll also get a host of other benefits including: Access to Regular class and fare payment from Nol Tag ID Ability to make payments at RTA parking meters, bus and water bus Eligibility for RTA's monthly pass/product Learn more about how you can top up your Nol card in convenient ways Pay on the go with Emirates NBD Cards Make secure, cashless payments using your compatible phone or wearable. Know more Dubai Ferry Free rides on Dubai Ferry Experience the scenic sites and greatest landmarks of Dubai Know more Free rides on Dubai Ferry Experience the scenic sites and greatest landmarks of Dubai The Dubai Ferry takes round trips on the waterfront route providing incredible views of landmarks such as Old Bastakiya, Gold Souk, Jumeirah beach, World Islands, Burj Al Arab and others and is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities. Your Go4it Card entitles you and one accompanying guest to a free ride on the Dubai Ferry. The exclusive rides for Go4it Cardholders are as per the below schedule. Route Description Schedule* FR3 Round trip from Al Ghubaiba water transport station up to the area close to Burj Al Arab 2:30pm (for one hour), First Saturday of the month Round trip from Al Ghubaiba water transport station up to the area close to Burj Al Arab 2:30pm (for one hour), Second Saturday of the month FR4 Round trip from Marina Mall water transport station up to the area close to Atlantis on Palm Jumeirah 2:30pm (for one hour), Third Saturday of the month Round trip from Marina Mall water transport station up to the area close to Atlantis on Palm Jumeirah 2:30pm (for one hour), Fourth Saturday of the month Terms and conditions All passengers are requested to be at the location no later than 15 minutes before departure. For details click here Learn more about claiming Emirates NBD benefits New Credit Shield Pro Secure your life with enhanced benefits 0.99% Monthly fee of your Card's outstanding balance Up to AED 300,000 Decease cover per cardholder AED 100 Pay out per day in case of hospitalization Up to AED 60,000 Job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment Learn more Life Insurance Complimentary Life Insurance Life Insurance cover of up to AED 75,000 Know More Easy installment plans Shop to your heart's content, pay back in small amounts! Buy electronics, jewelry, home décor, travel and entertainment tickets at participating merchants and pay it back in 3, 6, 12 or 24 months with 0% interest. English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / Diners Club Credit Card Diners Club Credit Card Your ideal travel companion Your Emirates NBD Diners Club Credit Card entitles you to savings on travel, dining, entertainment and more all over the world Earn upto 1.5% Plus Points on your retail spends Complimentary airport lounge access worldwide Up to 30% discount at over 2,000 restaurants across the UAE Diners Club Credit Card At a Glance Benefits Requirements & Charge Support At a glance Exclusive benefits, premium lifestyle Minimum salary: AED 12,000 Free insurance on big purchases Annual fees: AED 420 Key benefits and highlights Diners Club Credit Cards offer a world of privileges and benefits, making it the ideal travel companion. Earn Plus Points on spends 5% on Duty Free, 2.5% on dining and 0.5% on all other spends Plus Points earning cap per statement is applicable. Click here to know more Instant Plus points redemptions at key merchant outlets Get unlimited complimentary airport lounge access to over 1000 lounges worldwide Exclusive savings on travel, dining, entertainment and much more across the globe Emergency & security services, free roadside assistance and more benefits 0% Easy Payment Plans at select Merchant Outlets Utility bill payments facility Benefits of your  Diners Club Credit Card Airport lounge access Unlimited complimentary lounge access worldwide Indulge in over 1,500 comfortable premium lounges in more than 700 cities worldwide Supplementary cardholders can avail too Unlimited visits for cardholder Know more Unlimited complimentary lounge access worldwide Indulge in over 1,500 comfortable premium lounges in more than 700 cities worldwide Simply present your Diners Club card at any participating airport lounge and enter immediately no matter which airline or airline class you're travelling in. Supplementary cardholders can use this benefit too. Enjoy unlimited complimentary visits for self*. Additional guests will be charged extra. *Minimum spend criteria applies. Learn more about claiming Diners Club benefits Easy installment plans Shop to your heart's content, pay back in small amounts! Buy electronics, jewelry, home décor, travel and entertainment tickets at participating merchants and pay it back in 3, 6, 12 or 24 months with 0% interest. English | عربي Home / Cards / Credit Cards / Webshopper Credit Card Webshopper Credit Card The perfect card for online shopping This card is designed specifically for online purchases and ensures maximum security, so you can have utmost peace of mind when shopping online Works only on online purchases Earn Plus Points for every AED 200 spent At a glance Shop worry-free on secure websites Exclusively for online shopping Minimum salary: AED 5,000 Key benefits and highlights 1 Plus Point for every AED 200 spent Interest rate of 3.25% per month; minimum payment is 5% of the outstanding or AED 100, whichever is higher Interest-free period up to 55 days for retail purchases and related fees and charges Internet Use Safe for online shopping The WebShopper card can be used only for online transactions. For your security, your card number is printed and not embossed on the card. Hence, it cannot be used at merchants which require you to swipe/insert the card into a terminal or at ATMs to withdraw cash. Pay on the go with Emirates NBD Cards Make secure, cashless payments using your compatible phone or wearable. Know more New Credit Shield Pro Secure your life with enhanced benefits 0.99% Monthly fee of your Card's outstanding balance Up to AED 300,000 Decease cover per cardholder AED 100 Pay out per day in case of hospitalization Up to AED 60,000 Job loss cover for up to 12 months or until re-employment Learn more Easy installment plans Shop to your heart's content, pay back in small amounts! Buy electronics, jewelry, home décor, travel and entertainment tickets at participating merchants and pay it back in 3, 6, 12 or 24 months with 0% interest. Know more More advantages exclusively for you Requirements and documents Minimum salary: AED 12,000 Complimentary insurance cover for big ticket purchases Annual fees: AED 735 Required Documents Duly Chance to win couple tickets to watch a live match at Old Trafford Bon Appétit - an exclusive dining experience Earn 10X RED Points on sports goods, 5X RED Points on dining spends Earn 2X on all international spends Effective 1 June 2025, new application for Manchester United Credit Card will no longer be accepted.  Existing cardholders will continue to enjoy all the benefits and features associated with their cards without interruption.
